book.author: Kay, Michael
book.title: XSLT 2.0 and XPath 2.0 (4th Edition)
book.description: This book is primarily a practical reference book for professional XSLT developers.

book.author: Walmsley, Priscilla
book.title: XQuery
book.description: This in-depth tutorial not only walks you through the XQuery specification, but also teaches you how to program with this widely anticipated query language.

book.author: Kalin, Martin
book.title: Java Web Services: Up and Running
book.description: With this example-driven book, you get a quick, practical, and thorough introduction to Java's API for XML Web Services (JAX-WS) and the Java API for RESTful Web Services (JAX-RS).

book.author: Bloch, Joshua
book.title: Effective Java (2nd Edition)
book.description: Presents the most practical, authoritative guidelines available for writing efficient,well-designed programs.

book.author: de Botton, Alain
book.title: Status Anxiety
book.description: The author presents a universal condition of which many of us suffer from called Status Anxiety, investigates it's origins and possible solutions.

book.author: Rusty Harold, Elliotte
book.title: Processing XML with Java (SAX, DOM, JDOM, JAXP & TrAX)
book.description: Handing and processing XML in the Java programming language.

book.author: Poomsan Becker, Benjawan
book.title: Thai-English and English-Thai Dictionary
book.description: With Transliteration for Non-Thai Speakers - Complete with Thai Alphabet Guide

book.author: Jung, Carl Gustav
book.title: Psychological Types
book.description: Essential reading for anyone requiring a proper understanding of Jung's psychology, this was the work in which Jung set out his theory of psychological types as a means of understanding ourselves and the world around us.

book.author: Pawson, Dave
book.title: XSL-FO: Making XML Look Good in Print
book.description: Outlines XSL FO's strengths and weaknesses, provides a tutorial and reference guide.

book.author: Gray, Simon
book.title: Data Structures in Java
book.description: From Abstract Data Types to the Java Collections Framework.
